Summary: only found when viewing digital photo's but large craft, 100 ft plus
divs: sighting detailssighting of ufo 8\3\11 at 13.16pm this description can only be from a digital picture, the craft was not seen when i was taking the photo of a buzzard, however when i saw it on the laptop i couldn't believe it, it reminds me of some kind of underwater craft, the weather was clear, no clouds, and no aircraft, this was close to the landing flight path london gatwick airport but no, this is no aircraft, sighting of ufo 29\6\11 at 20.34pm this was followed by yet another sighting some three months later, at 20.34 on the 29\6\11 this was an all together larger craft, with many brightly lit windows, what seemed to run round the complete craft, they ran in two decks, with the top windows being somewhat smaller and showing less lighting than those on the lower deck, weather was cloudy with a sunset shining through the cloud, the craft seemed to be using the cloud as cover, i would like to add that i have reported these sightings to several organisations, having no positive response from any of them, these included people such as ufomek nick pope, one begins to feel that they have little or no interest at all, so why do the public waste their time reporting these events to them in the first place, when they know that like myself, they only run the risk of being totally ignored, it seems such a wast of time, as i have said, i do have perfectly good evidence of these two sightings, but would have to be convinced of someone having a serious interest before i would even consider releasing them to the public, i do hope you understand my position,
trends: There have been 154 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around March 8th 2011
